value.name: Trump wins South Carolina, beating Haley in her home state and further closing in on GOP nomination
value.description: Donald Trump has won South Carolina’s Republican primary, beating his last major rival, former U.N. Ambassador Nikki Haley, in her home state. Trump has already swept Iowa, New Hampshire and Nevada.

value.name: The Prime Minister In Waiting - but who really is Keir Starmer?
value.description: The man himself may insist it isn't over until the votes are in, but Keir Starmer looks likely to be the next prime minister. Who is he and how did he get here? And why do those close to him feel the public doesn't see all of what they see?

value.name: Rishi Sunak's £5 billion transport plan to "fire up" the north
value.description: RISHI Sunak vowed to revitalise Britain’s forgotten regions by pumping almost £5billion into improving transport links. The PM will use cash saved by scrapping the northern leg of HS2 to upgrade roads, rail and bus services in “red wall” areas.

value.name: RMT leader Mick Lynch gives Jeremy Corbyn general election backing
value.description: RMT leader Mick Lynch said the union would back Mr Corbyn should he run for his seat again as an independent. "We will support all sorts of people in this election, because we're not affiliated," Mr Lynch told the War on Want conference.

value.name: Rochdale: Is this the most chaotic by-election ever?
